glsa.title: Ampache: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: An SQL injection vulnerability and a possible identity theft have been discovered in Ampache.

background.p: Ampache is a PHP-based tool for managing, updating and playing audio files via a web interface.

description.p: LT discovered that the "match" parameter in albums.php is not properly sanitized before being processed. The Ampache development team also reported an error when handling user sessions.

impact.p: A remote attacker could provide malicious input to the application, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary SQL code. He could also entice a user to open a specially crafted link to steal the user's session.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Ampache users should upgrade to the latest version:
